text: actually maybe I can say a few words
about what reverse engineering is for
people that you know might not be
familiar with it the general idea is
that we try to understand what a program
does even though we do not have access
to the source code but this is the
typical case for malware because we
cannot call up while we're authors and
tell them okay please show me a code
because I don't really understand what
is what's going on there they just we
don't know where they are they don't
want to be found and they don't want to
give us their code anyway so what we
have to do then is like we have no other
solution but to look at the program and
see what instructions the program is
sending to the CPU and then try to
figure out from there based on those
instructions you know that are working
at the CPU level what the higher level
line of code that might have generated
this type of instruction might have been
so it's not really it's not entirely a
guessing game because it's sort of a
mostly exact science but also it's a
very unnatural operation to perform
because this CPU language was really
made for CPUs and machines and for us
humans like it's a extremely difficult
to understand like it's really it's
really not something natural for human
beings to read that those instructions
it doesn't make sense to us and it
really requires a lot of effort to
figure out what the programmer intent
was just by looking at those
instructions and so this is why actually
we are looking for reverse Engineers I
mean not just that guest procedures the
whole industry is looking for people
that are able to do this because it's
something that is that most people find
unpleasant and I have to say by itself I
do find it unpleasant most of the times
but you know at the end of the day when
I I am able to figure out what was
actually happening in the program I feel
very good about myself and so this is
the reason why you know I still do this
job but overall this is kind of a
difficult thing to do and it's kind of
painful and uh takes a lot of time to be
able to figure out even the simplest
programs
[Music]
